title: "Exploring the Practice of Fascination and Ecstasy"
first_phrase: In this text, the author continues to explore the concept of "fascination" and its potential relationship to spiritual experiences. In the last 200 tokens, the author describes the practice of somnambulic ecstatic fascination, which involves creating an upward magnetic movement to connect with the divine and achieve a state of ecstasy. The author also introduces Arturo Reghini, a philosopher and mathematician who wrote extensively on topics related to human nature and esotericism. The text concludes by discussing the possibility of inducing fascination through lethargic relaxation, which can lead to similar paranormal effects as the somnambulic ecstatic state.
